mapper.select: SELECT id, title, url, content, article_ts as publicationTime, published_date as pubDate FROM dataxet.news_article WHERE url = #{url} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, title, url, content, article_ts as publicationTime, published_date as pubDate FROM dataxet.news_article WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, title, url, content, article_ts as publicationTime, CONVERT_TZ(published_date, '+00:00', '+07:00') as pubDate FROM dataxet.news_article ORDER BY article_ts DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
